item.title: MC Eternal
item.description: Note This list is current as of the time of writing this but might not always be up-to-date. Take advice here with that knoweldge. Important Rules Our MC Eternal server follows all global rules that are appliciable to all of our other servers. You can find our global rules on our wiki and at /spawn. As an improtant note, do not build a 1 chunk bases or farms. ShadowNode staff will take action as required.
